mapper.sql: ID, DPRTCODE, ZT, ZXBS, F_BBID, B_BBID, WHBMID, WHRID, WHSJ, SHBMID, SHRID, SHSJ, SHYJ, PFBMID, PFRID, PFSJ, PFYJ, GBRID, GBRQ, GBYY, EOBH, BB, IS_XFSC, JX, ZJH, EOZT, BFRQ, JB, GZLX, SYLB, FJZCH, EOLB, EOFJ, JHGS_RS, JHGS_XSS, RII, ZXFS, HDWZ, PFJL, SHJL,GZNRFJID,JSGS

B.ID, B.DPRTCODE, B.ZT, B.ZXBS, B.F_BBID, B.B_BBID, B.WHBMID, B.WHRID, B.WHSJ, B.SHBMID, B.SHRID, B.SHSJ, B.SHYJ, B.PFBMID, B.PFRID, B.PFSJ, B.PFYJ, B.GBRID, B.GBRQ, B.GBYY, B.EOBH, B.BB, B.IS_XFSC, B.JX, B.ZJH, B.EOZT, B.BFRQ, B.JB, B.GZLX, B.SYLB, B.FJZCH, B.EOLB, B.EOFJ, B.JHGS_RS, B.JHGS_XSS, B.RII,B.ZXFS, B.HDWZ, B.PFJL, B.SHJL, B.GZNRFJID,B.JSGS
mapper.insert: insert into B_G2_010 (ID, DPRTCODE, ZT, ZXBS, F_BBID, B_BBID, WHBMID, WHRID, WHSJ, SHBMID, SHRID, SHSJ, SHYJ, PFBMID, PFRID, PFSJ, PFYJ, GBRID, GBRQ, GBYY, EOBH, BB, IS_XFSC, JX, ZJH, EOZT, BFRQ, JB, GZLX, SYLB, FJZCH, EOLB, EOFJ, JHGS_RS, JHGS_XSS, RII, ZXFS, HDWZ, PFJL, SHJL,GZNRFJID,JSGS) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{zxbs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fBbid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bBbid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{whbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{shbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{shyj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pfbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pfrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pfsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pfyj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gbrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gbrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gbyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eobh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bb,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isXfsc,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{jx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zjh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eozt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bfrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{jb,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{gzlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sylb,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fjzch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eolb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eofj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jhgsRs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{jhgsXss,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rii,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{zxfs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hdwz,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pfjl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{shjl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{gznrfjid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{jsgs,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.update:
update B_G2_010
DPRTCODE = #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZT = #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ZXBS = #{zxbs,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
F_BBID = #{fBbid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
B_BBID = #{bBbid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHBMID = #{whbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHRID = #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHSJ = #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SHBMID = #{shbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHRID = #{shrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHSJ = #{shsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SHYJ = #{shyj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PFBMID = #{pfbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PFRID = #{pfrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PFSJ = #{pfsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PFYJ = #{pfyj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GBRID = #{gbrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GBRQ = #{gbrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
GBYY = #{gbyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EOBH = #{eobh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BB = #{bb,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_XFSC = #{isXfsc,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
JX = #{jx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZJH = #{zjh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EOZT = #{eozt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BFRQ = #{bfrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
JB = #{jb,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
GZLX = #{gzlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYLB = #{sylb,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FJZCH = #{fjzch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EOLB = #{eolb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EOFJ = #{eofj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JHGS_RS = #{jhgsRs,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
JHGS_XSS = #{jhgsXss,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RII = #{rii,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ZXFS = #{zxfs,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HDWZ = #{hdwz,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PFJL = #{pfjl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SHJL = #{shjl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
GZNRFJID = #{gznrfjid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
JSGS = #{jsgs,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
JHGS_RS = #{jhgsRs,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
JHGS_XSS = #{jhgsXss,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
B_BBID = #{bBbid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

if.test: paramsMap != null and paramsMap.keyword != null and paramsMap.keyword != ''

sql.if: and ( UPPER(B.EOBH) like UPPER('%'||#{paramsMap.keyword}||'%') or UPPER(B.EOZT) like UPPER('%'||#{paramsMap.keyword}||'%') )

when.test: paramsMap != null and paramsMap.userType!=null and paramsMap.userType == "admin"

choose.when: AND exists ( SELECT 1 from D_007 where B.jx = FJJX AND B.dprtcode = DPRTCODE AND zt = 1 )

when.test: paramsMap != null and paramsMap.userType != "admin" and paramsMap.userId!=null and paramsMap.userId != ""

if.test: paramsMap != null and paramsMap.tgqxBegin != null and paramsMap.tgqxBegin != ''
paramsMap != null and paramsMap.tgqxEnd != null and paramsMap.tgqxEnd != ''

mapper.select:
select ID, DPRTCODE, ZT, ZXBS, F_BBID, B_BBID, WHBMID, WHRID, WHSJ, SHBMID, SHRID, SHSJ, SHYJ, PFBMID, PFRID, PFSJ, PFYJ, GBRID, GBRQ, GBYY, EOBH, BB, IS_XFSC, JX, ZJH, EOZT, BFRQ, JB, GZLX, SYLB, FJZCH, EOLB, EOFJ, JHGS_RS, JHGS_XSS, RII, ZXFS, HDWZ, PFJL, SHJL from b_g2_010 bg010 where bg010.dprtcode = #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and bg010.jx = #{jx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and bg010.zt = 7 and bg010.zxbs = 2 and bg010.zxfs = 2
and not exists (select 1 from b_g2_012 bg012 where bg012.eobh = bg010.eobh and bg012.yxbs = 1 and bg012.b_bbid is null and bg012.id != #{paramsMap.wxxmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
and (UPPER(bg010.eobh) like UPPER('%'||#{paramsMap.keyword}||'%') or UPPER(bg010.eozt) like UPPER('%'||#{paramsMap.keyword}||'%') )
order by bg010.eobh

select
, WTA.ID AS WTA_ID , WTA.MAINID AS WTA_MAINID , WTA.DPRTCODE AS WTA_DPRTCODE , WTA.YSWJM AS WTA_YSWJM , WTA.WBWJM AS WTA_WBWJM , WTA.NBWJM AS WTA_NBWJM , WTA.WJDX AS WTA_WJDX , WTA.CFLJ AS WTA_CFLJ , WTA.HZM AS WTA_HZM ,ZDR.ID as ZDR_ID ,ZDR.USERNAME as ZDR_USERNAME ,ZDR.REALNAME as ZDR_REALNAME ,D005.ZJH AS F_ZJH ,D005.ZWMS AS F_ZWMS ,D005.YWMS AS F_YWMS ,SHR.ID as SHR_ID ,SHR.USERNAME as SHR_USERNAME ,SHR.REALNAME as SHR_REALNAME ,PFR.ID as PFR_ID ,PFR.USERNAME as PFR_USERNAME ,PFR.REALNAME as PFR_REALNAME ,BG2995.ID AS CP_ID ,BG2995.LX AS CP_LX ,BG2995.GBID AS CP_GBID ,BG2995.GBH AS CP_GBH ,BG201001.ID AS SYX_ID ,BG201001.BH AS SYX_BH ,BG201001.XLH AS SYX_XLH ,BG201001.SZWZ AS SYX_SZWZ ,BG201001.XC AS SYX_XC ,BG201001.WHBMID AS SYX_WHBMID ,BG2998.ID AS FF_ID ,BG2998.DXID AS FF_DXID ,TDEPT.ID AS DEPT_ID ,TDEPT.DPRTNAME AS DEPT_DPRTNAME ,D008.XINGH AS SYX_XINGH from B_G2_010 B LEFT JOIN D_011 WTA ON B.GZNRFJID = WTA.MAINID and WTA.YXZT = 1 LEFT JOIN T_USER ZDR ON B.WHRID = ZDR.ID LEFT JOIN T_USER SHR ON B.SHRID = SHR.ID LEFT JOIN T_USER PFR ON B.PFRID = PFR.ID LEFT JOIN D_005 D005 ON B.DPRTCODE = D005.DPRTCODE AND B.ZJH = D005.ZJH LEFT JOIN B_G2_995 BG2995 ON BG2995.YWLX = 6 AND BG2995.YWID = B.ID LEFT JOIN B_G2_01001 BG201001 ON BG201001.MAINID = B.ID LEFT JOIN B_G2_998 BG2998 ON BG2998.YWID = B.ID LEFT JOIN T_DEPARTMENT TDEPT ON TDEPT.ID = BG2998.DXID LEFT JOIN D_008 D008 ON BG201001.BH = D008.BJH AND B.DPRTCODE = D008.DPRTCODE where 1=1 and B.ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT
FROM B_G2_010 B START WITH B.ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} CONNECT BY PRIOR B.F_BBID = B.ID

select g201001.id zxdxid, g201001.mainid eoid, g201001.gbzt, g201001.bh, g201001.xlh, g201001.qrzt, g201001.sgbs,
s2901.bjh, s2901.xlh,
s2008.id gdid, s2008.zt, s2008.gdsbid, s2008.dprtcode, s2008.sj_jsrq, s2008.zjh, s2008.gdbh, s2008.fjzch, s2008.gdbt, s2008.gdlx, s2008.sj_gzz, s2008.sj_jcz, s2008.gzxx, s2008.clcs, (COALESCE(s2008.jhgs_rs, 0) * COALESCE(s2008.jhgs_xss, 0)) jhgs, COALESCE(s2008.sj_gs, 0) sjgs,
d007.xlh msn,
d008.zwms bjzwmc, d008.ywms bjywmc,
s2007.id gbid, s2007.gbbh,
s2904.jhsjsj from b_g2_01001 g201001 join b_s2_901 s2901 on g201001.mainid = s2901.lyid and s2901.lylx = 2 and COALESCE(g201001.bh , '-') = COALESCE(s2901.bjh, s2901.fjzch) and COALESCE(g201001.xlh, '-') = COALESCE(s2901.xlh, s2901.fjxlh) and g201001.zt = 1 and g201001.mainid = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
left join (select t.jksjid, max(t.jhsjsj) jhsjsj from (select s2904.jksjid, wm_concat(s2904.jklbh || '#_#' || s2904.jhz || '#_#' || case when s2904.jklbh = '1_10' then s2904.sjz else case when s2904.sjz is null and s2904.csz is null then null else cast(COALESCE(s2904.sjz, '0') as integer) + cast(COALESCE(s2904.csz, '0') as integer) || '' end end) over(PARTITION BY s2904.jksjid order by s2904.jklbh) jhsjsj from b_s2_904 s2904 where s2904.zt = 1 and s2904.jhz is not null) t group by t.jksjid) s2904 on s2904.jksjid = s2901.id --工单 join b_s2_008 s2008 on s2008.jksjid = s2901.id --飞机注册信息 left join d_007 d007 on s2008.dprtcode = d007.dprtcode and s2008.fjzch = d007.fjzch --工包 left join b_s2_007 s2007 on s2007.id = s2008.gbid --部件主数据 left join d_008 d008 on d008.dprtcode = s2901.dprtcode and d008.bjh = s2901.bjh where 1 = 1 order by s2008.sj_jsrq desc
